item.description: Louis Vuitton's KeepAll has been an icon since it was first introduced in 1930. This particular KeepAll crated in durable black Epi leather embodies the spirit of modern travel. The bag is designed with two top handles, double top zip closure, an detachable name tag, a set of a lock and clochette for optimal security, and a fully lined spacious interior. This ready to go travel bag was also designed for a cabin-friendly size that generously holds about a week worth of travel essentials. Please note that there is visible scratches to the body, scuffing around the edges and tarnishing to the hardware due to wear. The bag also needs to be aired.

Bulgari Serpenti Tote bag crafted in navy and turquoise smooth leather and accented with green and black python leather features a snake-like double top handles and zipper pull made from brass light gold plated hardware. The bag also comes with a detachable shoulder strap and a spacious 3-part compartment. The 3-part compartment includes two seperate side zipped sections and an open compartment finished with two slip pockets and a side zipper pocket all secured by a single clasp. Fully lined.
